name: Tales From Down Below
description: A platformer game that you will play as a buffy and face the challenges in the game. A short reminder that this game is only available for desktop users. Let me teach you guys the primary keys to playing this game. First to move you have to use the left and right key to move. Next, you have to press a button to attack the enemies. A fun fact is that you have a dashing ability by pressing the d button, it will help you to dash while you attacking. This game is currently in progress so I hope players won't feel disappointed. I hope players can enjoy this game. Thank You and Enjoy The Game!
